page.title: 14MURDER
page.content: ABOUT ONE YEAR AGO THERE WAS A MURDER IN HOLME DOWN A LANE.TWO PEOPLE HAD STABBED A MAN TO DEATH AND WRAPPED HIM IN A SLEEPING BAG. THEY STOPPED ON THE MOTORWAY AND DUMPED HIM,THEN DROVE OFF. THAT NIGHT OUR SECRETARY'S HUSBAND WAS WALKING HIS DOG DOWN THE LANE AND HE SAW THE BODY AND PHONED THE POLICE. THE NEXT DAY THERE WERE POLICE CARS AND T.V CAMERAS ALL OVER.THAT NIGHT THEY SHOWED IT ON THE NEWS.EVENTUALLY THEY FOUND OUT WHO IT WAS.IT WAS A MAN AND A WOMAN FROM MANCHESTER WHO WERE TRYING TO MAKE AN INSURANCE FIRM THINK THAT SOMEONE ELSE WHO LOOKED LIKE THE WOMAN'S HUSBAND HAD DIED, SO THAT THEY COULD CLAIM A HUNDRED THOUSAND POUNDS.
